Tandoori Chicken





Traditional Recipe

Slice chicken breasts lengthwise and separate

Mix tandoori paste , garlic , lime juice and yogurt in dish

Place chicken in marinade covering all the chicken

Cover and place in refridgerator for 1 hour

Fry on stove in pan or on a bbq hotplate

Serve with green salad or mixture of finely cut cucumber and yogurt mix




Learn all of best tips and tricks for making the best Tandoori Chicken! One bite and you’ll know it is well worth every bit of effort.
